__e: Loyalty is a luxury, a luxury I cannot afford at this moment.
Loyalty is more important to me than money.
Get fucked. Your loyalty is very touching... but it is not the most important thing in your life right now.
I had a queer feeling that something might go wrong.
"I have the loyalty of my girls, and she said, "Do you?"
Of course, I realize that perhaps you were merely testing my loyalty in a very shrewd manner.
Quality, loyalty and service is our faith!
But only if you put into my hands your trust your loyalty and even your life.
When opportunity strikes... or when someone knows about loyalty... and as far as financial difficulties are concerned... I'm certainly not persuaded to do as other people might say and do.
But he's torn between his loyalty for the Prince and the desire to help us.
My first duty is loyalty to the kingdom.
If not for me, out of loyalty to the kingdom.
But your loyalty to our cause must be considered.
My loyalty to school wouldn't let me stay home in time of crisis.

that I will support and defend the constitution and laws of the United States of America against all enemies, foreign or domestic, that I will bear faith and allegiance to the same, that I will bear arms on behalf of the United States of America
Loyalty to a thing far greater than I.
I'm hoping that whatever you have to say to me has nothing to do with my loyalty to him.
He cares for me, and I care for him, but that doesn't tarnish my loyalty to you.
